Present","endDate":"Present","companyInformation":{"profile_url":"https://www.linkedin.com/company/dis-ag/","description":"Die DIS AG gehört zu den größten Personaldienstleistern im deutschsprachigen Raum. Als Marktführer in der Vermittlung von Fach- und Führungskräften stellen wir den Menschen in den Fokus. Wir sind so nah, wie Sie uns brauchen, und bieten die Qualität, die den Anforderungen entspricht. 

In unserem Netzwerk der Besten arbeiten rund 9.000 Mitarbeiter:innen in mehr als 100 Niederlassungen. Durch unsere Spezialisierung auf vier Geschäftsbereiche bieten wir neue Karriereperspektiven in nahezu allen Berufsfeldern: Finance, Financial Services, Industrie, Office & Management und IT. Mit unserer Innovationskraft sowie unserem Netzwerk vermitteln wir erfolgreich Fach- und Führungskräfte und setzen neue Maßstäbe in der Personaldienstleistung.

Als Arbeitgeber gehören wir übrigens nicht nur zu den größten Personaldienstleistern, sondern auch zu den Besten. Das Great Place to Work® Institute hat uns bereits 17-mal als einer von „Deutschlands Besten Arbeitgebern“ ausgezeichnet.
 
Als Unternehmen entwickeln wir uns hierarchie- und teamübergreifend weiter und fördern die Vielfalt in unseren Teams.

Kommen Sie ins Netzwerk der Besten! Werden Sie Teil unseres starken Teams, finden Sie mit unserer Unterstützung den idealen Arbeitgeber für sich oder die besten Mitarbeiter:innen für Ihr Unternehmen.

Tauchen Sie ein in die Welt der DIS AG!

But the world seems to forget that - too many nurturing adults are working in isolation.  Isolation from families and other caregivers. From key information. From exciting and innovative partners, experts, or centers of excellence.  It doesn’t have to be that way. 
That’s why we have built Famly - a platform for families and early education providers to collaborate, learn, and get their work done. It’s the most intuitive early childhood platform out there with an unrivaled team dedicated to our customers' success - and changing the way early childhood is perceived.  Plus, with the backing of the largest investment into early childhood software in European history, we are here to stay.  
Our platform lets families and educators help each other out, automates the boring stuff, and ultimately gives everyone a richer understanding of the children they nurture together.
How do we do it?
We improve a child’s learning journey by making it easier for nurturing adults to actively participate, share vital information, and grow closer.  We help providers work smarter, making operators more efficient with their money and time,  giving educators time back to spend on what matters.  We spread knowledge about child development to educators and families.  And we build our team by hiring people who are as passionate about making little ones a big deal as we are.
To join our team, head over here https://famly.recruitee.com/
Or to book your free demo today, head over here https://famly.co/demo
A good early childhood lasts a lifetime, so come and help us make sure the world gets more of them.","logo":"https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/C4E0BAQFxoZ0qA8-Jkw/company-logo_200_200/company-logo_200_200/0/1669018601973/famly_logo?e=1747872000&v=beta&t=uyfqif3t8UEe21qZlQlSxP2lvQGRYS2ApzYQwVqkCYw","industry":["Software Development"],"id":"3294390"},"description":"","company":"Famly","location":"Berlin, Germany","position":"Sales Development Representative","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/09/2024"},{"duration":"01/01/2022 - 01/07/2024","endDate":"01/07/2024","companyInformation":{},"description":"","company":"Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH","location":"Berlin, Germany","position":"Pädagogische Assistenz","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/01/2022"},{"duration":"01/02/2018 - 01/05/2018","endDate":"01/05/2018","companyInformation":{},"description":"","company":"International Rescue Committee","location":"On-site","position":"Student Intern","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/02/2018"},{"duration":"01/04/2015 - 01/05/2015","endDate":"01/05/2015","companyInformation":{},"description":"","company":"AMBEG Dr. J. {"skills":["Business-to-Business (B2B)","Vertrieb"],"firstName":"Steven","lastName":"Dort","profilePicture":"https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4D03AQF0ysuVm97wwQ/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0/1701981754147?e=1748476800&v=beta&t=TxXddpCfXUBCkqfNK8Ykh3Uy04PmHUyRqLT-drgbAcU","linkedinProfile":"https://www.linkedin.com/in/steven-dort-5170702a4","education":[{"duration":"01/08/2014 - 01/08/2017","institution":"OSZ Handel","endDate":"01/08/2017","degree":"Kaufmann im Einzelhandel","location":"Berlin, Berlin, Germany","subjectStudy":"","startDate":"01/08/2014"}],"providerId":"ACoAAElV-eMBx_D4Qfy0hSJDzUemUNjirafudps","workExperience":[{"duration":"01/12/2024 - Present","endDate":"Present","companyInformation":{"employee_count":1124,"profile_url":"https://www.linkedin.com/company/liebherr-home-appliances/","activities":["Fridges","Freezers","Side-by-Side","French Door","Wine Cabinets","Humidors"],"description":"For over six decades Liebherr-Hausgeraete GmbH has been specializing in manufacturing innovative refrigerators and freezers. The company employs more than 6,500 staff and produces a wide range of refrigerators and freezers for domestic and professional use at its sites in Ochsenhausen (Germany), Lienz (Austria), Marica (Bulgaria), Kluang (Malaysia) and Aurangabad (India). With an annual production of nearly 2.3 million appliances, Liebherr is one of the leading European manufacturers in the premium class and stands for quality, design, and innovation. 

In 1954, Hans Liebherr made his first fridges in Ochsenhausen and shortly thereafter they went into series production. This laid the foundation for Liebherr-Hausgeraete GmbH, which is still the divisional controlling company of all production sites for refrigerators and freezers and manages one of the thirteen product segments of the Liebherr Group. 

Quality, design, and innovation 

Liebherr-Hausgeraete GmbH has a mission to inspire their customers every day with intelligent refrigerators and freezers and individualized solutions. The company's leading market position is determined by its continuous endeavor for perfection and a love for detail. Providing comprehensive talent placement for long-term partnerships: Empion is your specialist for high-quality placements in branches such as marketing, sales, finance, banking, IT, HR, consulting, and various other industries. We apply our expertise to connect businesses with the right professionals. 

What sets us apart: 

Empion is the first automated headhunting system for the skilled labor market. Applicants and companies are matched through a AI-based Robo Advisor based on skills, values, and personality traits. 

In a research-based employer analysis, the Robo Advisor quantifies corporate values and seeks potential candidates accordingly. Talents discover their ideal corporate culture type through Empion. After evaluating the analysis, Empion presents them with suitable job offers. 

Our vision: 

We aim to bring individuality to recruiting, providing both companies and applicants with a personalized experience in talent and job searches. We don't see ourselves merely as traditional recruiters but as dedicated strategic talent consultants. 

Our approach is characterized by personal attention, tailored actions, and a commitment to our talents that goes beyond the ordinary.

𝐎𝐮𝐫 𝐚𝐥𝐥-𝐢𝐧-𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐬𝐨𝐥𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧:

💻 Seller Hub:

💻 Vendor Hub:

We celebrate scientific discovery and the creative application of science to solve problems. Interactions with our customers, partners and vendors are central to everything we do, and we value those relationships. We seek out and build connections across the globe and in our local communities because creative problem solving requires a network of diverse ideas and viewpoints. 

We develop and evolve technologies and instrumentation in collaboration with scientists and researchers around the globe. From simple cloning vectors used to address fundamental questions in biology to bioluminescent assays that help us monitor food safety and water quality, we work side-by-side with our partners in academic, industrial and government institutions to bring the best minds to bear on the toughest questions.

Since 1978, we have done this all with a steadfast commitment to sustainable business models that protect our environment, inspire and develop our employees as individuals, support the wellbeing and growth of our communities, and strengthen our relationships with our customers.

With 16 branches around the world, Promega products are used by a global community of life scientists who are asking fundamental questions about biological processes as well as by scientists who are applying scientific knowledge to diagnose and treat diseases, discover new therapeutics, and use genetics and DNA testing for human identification.
","industry":["Biotechnology Research"],"id":"10754"},"description":"Consulting Customers to find the right solution for their tasks, covering a broad portfolio of products for life-science research, webinars as well as custom OEM manufacturing.

We are the better decisions group (bdg), an international consultancy for Corporate Performance Management (CPM) and Business Intelligence (BI) solutions. As a long-standing partner of leading software providers such as Board, Jedox and SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC), we deliver customised solutions and best practice approaches for planning, reporting and analysis.

Our experience of 20 years is reflected in numerous successful projects: companies such as Zalando, KFC, Siemens Energy and Sainsbury's have already implemented successful projects with bdg – to name just a few examples.

Our focus is on the business lines Finance & Controlling, Marketing & Sales, Human Resources and Procurement as well as on the Retail, Energy, Housing & Real Estate and Manufacturing sectors. We focus on specialised industry and business line solutions that meet the diverse and complex requirements of our customers.

What can you expect from a project with bdg?
We understand our customers! To support them in the holistic optimisation of their business processes, we accompany them throughout the entire project on both the professional and technical side – from the evaluation of the suitable software and the joint definition of the company-relevant KPIs through to the complete implementation of the project. We combine crucial knowledge as we are both industry specialists and technology experts.

For a quick ROI of the project, it is also essential that all users adopt the new system. Therefore, we already involve the team in the implementation phase so they become competent and convinced users of the new solution. Our focus is customer success – only together can we achieve success. That is why we continue to accompany our customers after the project has been completed, with regular health checks, surveys, updates and support.

In addition – and also independent of implementation projects – we offer training by experienced trainers.","industry":["IT Services and IT Consulting"],"id":"3808625"},"description":"Also das ist schon Sales, nur mit drüber Nachdenken und so ...","company":"bdg | better decisions group","location":"","position":"SDR","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/06/2024"},{"duration":"01/07/2020 - Present","endDate":"Present","companyInformation":{},"description":"Stell dir vor, dein Job ist es, alles zu lernen was es so gibt – das zu kapieren und einzuordnen – und dann in wenigen Worten so zu erklären, dass es jeder versteht ...","company":"bdg | better decisions group","location":"","position":"Texter","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/07/2020"},{"duration":"01/01/2019 - 01/01/2024","endDate":"01/01/2024","companyInformation":{},"description":"Unvergessliche Zeit als Lichtdouble und Produktionsassistent bei der Sendung "Anne Will" einmal quer durch Corona-Pandemie und Ukrainekrieg!","company":"Will Media","location":"","position":"Produktionsassistent","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/01/2019"},{"duration":"01/01/2011 - 01/01/2014","endDate":"01/01/2014","companyInformation":{},"description":"Als Content Editor und später Projektassistent war ich direkt an der operativen Umsetzung von E-Learning Kursen beteiligt. One of my main clients was “Goldenes Kleeblatt" (GK), a company from a good friend of mine which is selling vegan, nutritional supplements in the B2C & B2B segments. It focusses mainly on the delivery of melatonin, vitamin c and zinc capsules. 

Important note - I did not work full time over the two years with GK. Rather,  I worked occasionally with the team throughout this time period. 

I was hired to develop a marketing strategy (mainly for social media & digital marketing) and writing captivating copy through several channels such as website, social media, e-mail, flyers and more.  Furthermore, I could help the founder Mohamed Bouaissa to scale up the business model by connecting him with my friend Alex (founder from ADCOLLECTIVE), an experienced & highly valuable performance marketer, who developed the website & ensured the practical implementation of the ad campaign strategy. 

Alex became THE Head of digital marketing & was one of the main reasons why scaling GK became a no-brainer. 

Mohamed did a great job in creating a team full of creative talent and delivering on the brand promise. In corporation with Alex and Gündüz, the Head of Design at Goldenes Kleeblatt, we were able to design great UI, UX and set the tone of the brand through videos, images & text. 

In the final phase of my work I created an irresistible offer for naturopaths to support the development of GK’s B2B segment. 

All in all, I contributed to improving the sleeping habits of more than 1000 customers and had a lot of fun during the process with the team. 

I appreciate the offer from Mohamed and his partner to own the development of the B2B segment. However, for the moment (April 2022) I’m considering working in management consulting or the tech industry. Still, I do think about developing GK’s blog in the future - I’ll edit this section once I have started writing blog articles again. ","company":"Goldenes Kleeblatt","location":"Berlin, Deutschland","position":"Marketing Consultant","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/12/2020"},{"duration":"01/05/2019 - 01/09/2019","endDate":"01/09/2019","companyInformation":{},"description":"Before I am going to let you know how my internship went, what I was actually working on & how I contributed to the digital success from SMC, I just want to tell you that Australia is an amazing country. Make sure that whenever you got the chance to visit this beautiful place, you don't hesitate. Plan your trip, think about the possible impact it may have on your life and go for it. You won't regret it. Stepping out of your comfort zone, meeting new people and getting to know a different culture will only enhance your wisdom, life quality and overall performance at work - it is truly a great investment. Especially when you do it while you're cute 19 years old, like I was at my arrival in Sydney. 

Further, I am really thankful to the Business School of Economics and Law Berlin, which not only enabled me to study one semester abroad and do an internship at an amazing educational institution such as Social Media College, but more importantly - gain a life experience I won't forget. 

It was an interesting internship within the marketing function (after football one of my biggest passions), in which I could finally use the skills I've gained over the last 3 years through visiting university and inhaling all the secret sales & marketing knowledge from books. 

The SMC Team was great, the working atmosphere amazing and with Jonathon Tanner (CEO & Co Founder) I found a mentor, who was patient with the new intern, had trust in me and identified quickly my potentials. 

I was responsible for the Instagram Content Strategy & Community Management. Even though it was an unpaid role, it was worth investing my time and getting a first step into digital marketing. Social Media Marketing is cool, but I think that Digital Marketing is the real deal. Jon gave me the advice to go deeper into digital. As a former consultant, he taught me how to think strategically and truly opened my mind. Again, thank you very much to the whole SMC Team.","company":"Social Media College","location":"Sydney und Umgebung, Australien","position":"Product & Marketing Assistant","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/05/2019"},{"duration":"01/06/2017 - 01/06/2018","endDate":"01/06/2018","companyInformation":{},"description":"Aniso Rent A Car is our family business. My older brothers founded a successful car rental agency here in Berlin that has grown over the last couple of years. I already got involved in 2014 (16 years old), where I've worked on simple tasks such as writing invoices and cleaning cars.

During this internship I had the chance to have a look into several business functions such as accounting, marketing and operations. I had no big impact here, however I am very thankful for the privilege of being the younger brother that can learn from the successes & failures of his older ones. 

They have taught me respect, humbleness & social behaviour. I do not think that I could have learned so much in a short amount of time, if I hadn't the chance to be so deeply involved in the growth of a startup from a young age. 

I could see how important it is to treat customers well so they come to rent from our agency at a consistent basis. Also, if you´re just your true authentic self, you'll be much more appreciated than if you're trying to be somebody else. Furthermore - planning is good, calculated action is better. 

My older brother Anis, whom I respect a lot for his personal achievements, has always taught me to not focus too much on theory. Rather, sometimes you need to take bold risks so you can achieve your goals as an entrepreneur. And if you fail, well, then it is a lesson that you carry with you. Keep going.

From my brother Imad I could learn the obsession to detail and its effects on customer satisfaction. He always made sure that the office & cars are clean. Of course, clients recognize that and respect the effort for delivering that service by revisiting Aniso & spreading word of mouth. 

All in all I took with me that whatever I do - as long as I do it with passion & the ability to deliver measurable improvements, I can call it a day. 

Cheers.","company":"Aniso Rent A Car","location":"Berlin, Deutschland","position":"Business Administrator","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/06/2017"},{"duration":"01/02/2013 - 01/02/2013","endDate":"01/02/2013","companyInformation":{},"description":"I had my first internship in Berlin (two weeks) at PCCOM, a company which is helping consumers solving problems of hard- and software. 

It was definitely a great experience since I could gain one of my first insights into the IT & management department. Furthermore, I improved my ability to work in a team and deliver project deliverables in an efficient way. Since most of my colleagues were very kind and supportive to the new 14-year old intern, I learned a lot of things in a really short time. 

During the internship I took three key learnings with me:

1. How to install and repair operating systems 

2. How to analyze & resolve software issues 

3. How to understand consumers & communicate with them effectively 

All in all it was a great choice for my school internship, because it built the foundation for my growing interest in Management & IT.","company":"PCCOM Service & Store ","location":"Berlin ","position":"Information Technology Assistant","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/02/2013"}],"location":"Berlin, Berlin, Germany","certifications":[],"headline":"Delivering value is the key to all strategic decisions.","languageSkills":{"Deutsch":"Native or bilingual proficiency","Englisch":"Full professional proficiency","Arabisch":"Native or bilingual proficiency","Französisch":"Limited working proficiency"}}

Present","endDate":"Present","companyInformation":{"profile_url":"https://www.linkedin.com/company/fm-sales/","description":"Du verlierst auf dem Weg zum Abschluss immer wieder Leads? Dein Sales-Cycle ist zu lang? Du hast Wachstumsschübe aber kein Plan zur Skalierung?

Oder eine kleine Stimme in deinem Kopf sagt gerade: Welche Leads? Welcher Wachstum?

Du findest einfach, dass dein Vertrieb nicht so richtig zieht? 

Ganz egal was in deinem Vertriebsprozess hakt, Fakt ist: 

Es kostet dich Kunden. 
Es kostet dich Umsatz. 
Es kostet dich Wachstum. 
Es kostet dich Nerven. 

Dabei muss das nicht sein. 

Denn mit simplen Strategien, bewährten Vertriebskonzepten und leicht anwendbaren Methoden stellen wir genau die Stellschrauben auf SALES, die gerade deinen Verkaufserfolg verhindern. 

Ganz individuell für dich als Unternehmer, Neu- und Quereinsteiger oder sogar erfahrenen Vertriebler: 

Wir identifizieren und eliminieren, was auch immer deinen Vertrieb vom Abschluss abhält und sorgen dafür, dass du den richtigen Match zwischen deinem Angebot und dem Markt findest. 

Damit du dich auf dein Business konzentrieren kannst, anstatt dir Sorgen über deine Vertriebs-Pipeline zu machen. 

Klingt gut?

01/02/2024","endDate":"01/02/2024","companyInformation":{"profile_url":"https://www.linkedin.com/company/coachhub/","description":"CoachHub is the leading global talent development platform that enables organizations to create personalized, measurable and scalable coaching programs for their entire workforce, regardless of department and seniority level.

Our global pool of coaches includes more than 3,500 certified business coaches in 90 countries across six continents with coaching sessions available in over 80 languages. 

We serve more than 1,000 clients worldwide with our innovative coaching programs, based on proprietary scientific research and development from our Innovation Lab. 

CoachHub is backed by leading tech investors including Sofina, SoftBank Vision Fund 2, Molten Ventures, Speedinvest, HV Capital, Partech and Silicon Valley Bank/SVB Capital.

Business Strategy & Consulting: Helping businesses define, refine, and execute their vision
Our Vision
Elmon Agency is committed to empowering businesses to thrive in a fast-paced and competitive world. By transforming industries through cutting-edge technology, optimized processes, and strategic insights, we enable our clients to achieve long-term growth and success.

Who We Serve
We partner with innovative and growth-driven businesses, from ambitious startups to established enterprises. Our expertise spans industries such as technology, healthcare, hospitality, retail, manufacturing, and beyond. Our clients share a common goal: embracing transformative solutions that simplify success and drive meaningful results.

The Diana Legacy Project
At Elmon Agency, our mission to make a difference goes beyond business. Through The Diana Legacy Project, we support charities and social organizations by providing them with the technology they need to amplify their impact. Inspired by the legacy of kindness and community service of our founder’s grandmother, Diana, this initiative reflects our values of empowerment, innovation, and giving back.

Let’s Work Together
Ready to unlock growth and transform your vision into reality? The cloud solution transforms and unifies online and physical operations, multichannel sales, expansion to new locations, global payments, financing and connection to supplier networks.

Founded in Montréal, Canada in 2005, Lightspeed is dual-listed on the New York Stock Exchange and Toronto Stock Exchange (NYSE: LSPD) (TSX: LSPD). With teams across North America, Europe and Asia Pacific, the company serves retail, hospitality and golf businesses in over 100 countries.

...

En propulsant les entreprises qui constituent la base de l'économie mondiale, la plateforme de commerce unique de Lightspeed aide les commerçants à innover pour simplifier, faire évoluer et offrir des expériences client exceptionnelles. 

La solution infonuagique transforme et unifie les opérations en ligne et physiques, les ventes multicanales, l'expansion vers de nouveaux emplacements, les paiements mondiaux, le financement et la connexion aux réseaux de fournisseurs.
Fondée à Montréal, au Canada, en 2005, Lightspeed est doublement cotée à la Bourse de New York et à la Bourse de Toronto (NYSE : LSPD) (TSX : LSPD). Avec des équipes réparties en Amérique du Nord, en Europe et en Asie-Pacifique, l'entreprise est au service des entreprises de vente au détail, d'hôtellerie et de golf dans plus de 100 pays.

Our services focus on the needs of patients and physicians and offer them an added value.

Each month, 6 million patients consult jameda.de to find their medical treatment through a sophisticated doctor search. While searching for the appropriate physician, patients benefit from more than 2.5 million reviews, useful filter functions and a database of more than 250,000 medical professionals across Germany. 

As soon as the appropriate physician is found, patients can either pay a visit to the physician's practice onsite or attend an appointment via online video consultation. In addition, jameda provides an online video communication solution with its product patientus for medical institutions, clinics, health insurance companies and medical care centers.


Through the perspective of a physician, jameda offers an all-in-one solution for the digital patient contact: a cloud-based calendar with an online appointment functionality and online video consultations. Furthermore, physicians have the opportunity to present their medical practice and to provide comprehensive information about their range of services on jameda.de.

Learn more about jameda, its products and innovations for physicians and patients:
www.jameda.de
www.facebook.com/jameda.de
www.twitter.com/jameda_de
www.instagram.com/jameda.de

Impressum: https://www.jameda.de/jameda/impressum.php

The PAPER & TEA story starts with the sun, a blank piece of paper, and a good cup of tea. Today, our mission goes further, as we strive to enrich life by creating added value through our actions.

We are a brand where everyone is invited to celebrate togetherness, share ideas, and discover the beauty of life. 

We believe that good products lead to good moments, which in turn lead to great stories. 

WE BELIEVE PEOPLE MAKE A DIFFERENCE.

At our core, we aim to make a positive and sustainable impact through all that we do, whether it‘s small gestures like sharing a smile or a warm cup of tea, or larger commitments to economic and environmental issues and social responsibility. 

OUR PLACES

In each of our physical and digital spaces, we strive to connect people and create a sense of community.
They inspire. Appeal to all senses. Provide tranquility and room to breathe. Encourage people to linger and truly be themselves.

WE ARE A LIVING BRAND

We cannot be categorized. We as a brand are a connector, a warmth giver, an innovator, bringing people and placed together. Hotels have got pretty out of sync with their guests. In a high-speed digital world, third parties - like online travel agencies - have hijacked those direct interactions that used to go on between hotels and guests. Only thing is, these third parties never meet the guest face-to-face, meaning that customer experience suffers. Hotels, on the other hand, know their guests personally. They get to know how someone likes their coffee, what sports they're into, which spa treatments they enjoy, and how often they go hiking.

Smart Host lets hotels use this knowledge in a systematic way. The hotel can re-establish direct interactions, the guest gets a better customer experience, and everyone wins. This process happens completely automatically and in the background. Smart Host uses the most advanced methods of data segmentation, machine learning, artificial intelligence and automatic communication systems. The result is an improved customer experience and communication, which turns into more direct bookings and increased profitability.  

Our team is diverse, international and highly motivated. Our software's DNA is made up of the best ideas from some of the industry's top data scientists, software engineers and interaction designers. But what we all have in common is that we care about our customers and users.

Smart Host, the world’s most user-friendly CRM System.

Our mission: to make athletes better. 

Our vision: to inspire you with performance solutions you never knew you needed and can’t imagine living without. 

Our values define and unite us, the beliefs that are the red thread that connect everyone at Under Armour. Our values are rallying cries, reminding us why we’re here, and fueling everything we do. 

LOVE ATHLETES 

We believe in waking up every morning to make athletes legendary. From the best of the best to the ones just getting started, we put the athlete at the center of everything we do. We create fearlessly with the courage and conviction to defy convention. We innovate by taking bold and smart risks. We show up big where athletes train, compete, and recover. 

CELEBRATE THE WINS 

We believe our victories, big and small, bring us together as a team. We celebrate our accomplishments, giving credit where it's due. We take time to have fun. We channel past successes to inspire our next win. 

STAND FOR EQUALITY 

We believe sport is the great unifier. We don't sit on the sidelines; we speak up for fairness and equity. We treat each other with respect. We apply different perspectives in our work. We come together as a force for good to serve the communities we represent. 

ACT SUSTAINABLY 

We believe our work is not just what we do but how we do it. We work ethically and efficiently to perfect performance while reusing the Earth's resources. We seek new information to develop lasting solutions. We protect our planet for all who now play, and all who will play, on our home field. 

FIGHT ON TOGETHER 

We believe strength is built through tackling adversity. We act with an enterprise mindset in the best interest of the Brand. We help each other overcome obstacles. We act with integrity, have honest conversations and grow over mistakes. We approach challenges with positive intent and never quit.

Our private and small group classes are taught by 1,500+ qualified, native-level teachers from around the world, leading more than 550,000 classes per year. Our lessons are offered 24/7, empowering even the busiest people to master a language and unlock their potential, at any time from anywhere.

We believe in a communicative approach to language learning that allows students to put their new language skills into practice immediately. Our CEFR-aligned learning materials are designed by linguistic experts and focus on meaningful topics that relate to our students’ interests, careers and everyday lives. Thanks to our extensive rotating roster of teachers and our small group classes, students are exposed to a variety of regional accents and expressions within the same language and have the time and space to practice speaking in every lesson.

Our diverse team includes over 250 international professionals, representing dozens of countries and languages. Ich begleitete den gesamten Vertriebsprozess, von der Identifikation neuer Kunden (Hunting) bis zur Schulung und Unterstützung von Therapeuten und Gesundheitseinrichtungen nach Vertragsabschluss.

Zu meinen Hauptaufgaben gehörten:

Vertrieb und Kundenakquise: Proaktives Hunting durch die Erstellung von Skripten und Prozessen, einschließlich der Festlegung von Zielen.
Verkaufsgespräche: Durchführung von Pitch- und Verkaufsgesprächen mit Therapeuten zur Vorstellung unserer Produkte und Dienstleistungen.
Vertragsmanagement: Verantwortung für den gesamten Prozess vom Erstkontakt bis zum Vertragsabschluss, inklusive der Vorbereitung von Terminen und dem Erforderlichen Fachwissen.
Nutzung von Salesforce: Effiziente Verwaltung von Kundenbeziehungen und Vertriebsaktivitäten, einschließlich Dokumentation von Anrufen, Notizen und E-Mails.
Beratung: Unterstützung von Therapeuten und Praxispersonal zur Optimierung der Terminvergabe und Praxisorganisation.
Entwicklung eigener Hunting-Strategien: Eigenständige Entwicklung und Umsetzung von Akquise-Strategien zur Steigerung der Effizienz.
Team-Motivation: Förderung eines positiven Mindsets im Team durch Motivation und Hartnäckigkeit.
Durch diese Tätigkeiten konnte ich nicht nur meine Vertriebsfähigkeiten weiterentwickeln, sondern auch maßgeblich zur Steigerung der Kundenzufriedenheit und des Unternehmenswachstums beitragen.","company":"Doctolib","location":"Berlin, Deutschland · Remote","position":"Inside Sales Managerin","type":"fullTime","startDate":"01/04/2024"},{"duration":"01/09/2023 - 01/04/2024","endDate":"01/04/2024","description":"In meiner Rolle im Global Payroll Management war ich verantwortlich für die Aufbereitung und Steuerung von Standardreports sowie abrechnungsrelevanten Daten. Since then, we’ve been on a mission to revolutionize the way people sell and buy property. At Homeday we believe that there is a better way, by offering more transparency, efficiency and an overall smoother experience for all parties involved. Through our unique technology, our personal customer service and our local real estate partners, we aim at making real estate transactions as simple, effortless and fast as possible. Today, Homeday is one of Germany's largest platforms to find the best local agents and sell properties. We’re a team of around 30 people working in our offices in the hearts of Berlin and Cologne. We’re thinking big: Our mission is to revolutionize the real estate market across the world. To achieve this, we are constantly looking for independent-thinkers who share our passion for making a change, enjoy taking on responsibility and getting things done. 

Together with you, we can build the global destination for property owners to sell their property. Campus gibt es in München, Stuttgart, Freiburg, Frankfurt, Köln, Hamburg, Leipzig und Berlin. Unterrichtssprachen sind Deutsch und Englisch. 

Zum Portfolio der Hochschule Macromedia gehören staatlich-anerkannte BA- und MA-Studiengänge in den Bereichen Medien, Musik und Journalismus, Film, Schauspiel und Psychologie sowie Management und Mode, Coding, Design und Games. Ein PhD-Studium in Kooperation komplettiert das Studienangebot, bei dem fachübergreifend die Chancen des digitalen Wandels im Zentrum stehen.  

Seit 2013 ist die Hochschule Macromedia Teil der privaten Bildungsgruppe Galileo Global Education. Mit 54 Schools und etwa 170.000 Studierenden ist Galileo europaweit der größte Anbieter für Studien- und Ausbildungsgänge im Segment angewandte Kunst, Kommunikation und Management.  

www.hochschule-macromedia.de/impressum

+++

Macromedia University is a nationwide, private university with more than 5,000 students and over 140 professors. There are campuses in Munich, Stuttgart, Freiburg, Frankfurt, Cologne, Hamburg, Leipzig and Berlin. Teaching languages are German and English.

The portfolio of the Macromedia University of Applied Sciences includes state-recognized BA and MA courses in media, music and journalism, film acting and psychology as well as management and coding, fashion, design and games. A PhD programme in cooperation completes the portfolio, which focuses on the opportunities of digital change across disciplines.

Since 2013, Macromedia University has been part of the private education group Galileo Global Education. With 54 schools and approximately 170,000 students, Galileo is Europe's largest provider of study and training programs in the field of applied arts, communication and management.
